title: Quarkus 3.2.2.Final released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 3.2.2.Final, the second maintenance release of our 3.2 release train. We released 3.2.1.Final a few days ago but two annoying regressions were spotted before we announced it so we decided to not announce it and release a 3.2.2.Final right away. These two releases contains mostly bugfixes...
